function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Directory server hostname or IP address

sequence.script:
mylocation=location STAFCmdParams='' STAFCmd=''
if dsPath: dsBinPath='%s/%s' % (dsPath,fileFolder) STAFCmd='%s/%s%s' % (dsBinPath,DSCONFIG,fileExt)
STAFCmdParamsList=[] STAFCmdParamsList.append('get-%s-prop ' % (objectName)) STAFCmdParamsList.append('--%s-name "%s" -s' % (propertyType,propertyName))
STAFCmdParamsList.append('--property "%s"' % (attributeName)) if extraParams: STAFCmdParamsList.append(extraParams)

function.name: addIndex
function.function-prolog: This function eases adding JEB DB indexes

function-arg-def.name: host
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Directory server hostname or IP address

function-arg-def.name: backendID
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: The Back-end ID on to which to add an index

function-arg-def.name: indexAttribute
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: ldap attribute on to which to add indexing

function-arg-def.name: indexTypes
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: type of index to add This has to be provided as a python array like [ 'presence', 'substring' ]

function-arg-property.name: type
function-arg-property.function-arg-property-description: This argument can only have one of those values

sequence.script: dsconfigParams='' dsconfigCmd='' dsBinPath='%s/%s' % (dsPath,fileFolder) dsconfigCmd='%s/%s%s' % (dsBinPath,DSCONFIG,fileExt) dsconfigParams = 'create-local-db-index -n -h %s -p %s -D "%s" -w %s --backend-name %s --index-name %s --set index-type:%s' % (host,port,rootDN,rootPwd,backendID, indexAttribute, ' --set index-type:'.join(indexTypes))

function.name: modifyIndex
function.function-prolog: This function eases modifying JEB DB indexes

function-arg-def.name: host
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Directory server hostname or IP address

function-arg-def.name: backendID
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: The Back-end ID on to which to add an index

function-arg-def.name: indexAttribute
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: ldap attribute on to which add indexing

function-arg-def.name: operation
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: This parameters defines the operation to be performed.

function-arg-property.name: type
function-arg-property.function-arg-property-description: This argument can only have one of the following values

function-arg-def.name: indexProperty
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: the property to manipulate if the operation is add or set

function-arg-def.name: indexPropertyValue
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: the value for the provided property

sequence.script: dsconfigParams='' dsconfigCmd='' dsBinPath='%s/%s' % (dsPath,fileFolder) dsconfigCmd='%s/%s%s' % (dsBinPath,DSCONFIG,fileExt) operationArguments = indexProperty if indexPropertyValue: operationArguments = '%s:%s' % (indexProperty, indexPropertyValue) dsconfigParams = 'set-local-db-index-prop -n -h %s -p %s -D "%s" -w %s --backend-name %s --index-name %s --%s %s' % ( host, port, rootDN, rootPwd, backendID, indexAttribute, operation, operationArguments )
